# M {.unlisted}

[]{#Microdata .anchor}**Microdata:** A microdata dataset is the equivalent of an individual data dataset, in which each record (each row) corresponds to the information of a statistical unit (individual, household, company, etc.), information from a survey, a directory or an administrative file.
